name: self-help
description: Unlock your full potential and achieve personal growth with our inspiring collection of self-help books. Discover practical advice and transformative insights for a more empowered life

name: Action
description: Action books are adrenaline-packed adventures that keep you on the edge of your seat. Get ready for heart-pounding excitement and thrilling escapades in every page-turning moment

name: Drama
description: Dive into the world of intense emotions and riveting human experiences with our collection of drama books. From heart-wrenching tragedies to gripping tales of conflict and redemption, these books bring the stage to life on every page

name: History
description: Explore the past and uncover the secrets of civilizations with our captivating history books. From ancient empires to modern revolutions, our collection offers a glimpse into the events and people that shaped the world

name: Biography
description: Discover the lives and legacies of remarkable individuals through our biography collection. Journey through history and gain insights into the captivating stories of extraordinary people

name: Novels
description: Immerse yourself in the world of captivating narratives and intricate characters. Explore the art of storytelling through our vast collection of novels
